item.title: Version 1.2.14
item.description:
What's New

Release v1.2.14

Features:

  • Add user dictionary feature for custom word management
  • Implement word ignore list in spell checker
  • Add UI for managing user dictionary in Advanced settings

Improvements:

  • Fix engine buffer reset logic for non-space word breaks
  • Prioritize macro processing over spell check
  • Clear typing states after restore operations
  • Fix shortcut conflict detection in HotkeyRecorderView
  • Improve input source detection and handling

Bug Fixes:

  • Fix buffer not clearing correctly after injections
  • Fix typing states persisting after restore
  • Resolve shortcut recording conflicts
  • Improve engine state management
